duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide general legal support on a wide variety of key projects, including negotiating and drafting commercial agreements.
Oversee the company's intellectual property matters, including negotiating licensing rights and managing the company's trademark and other intellectual property assets.
Advise executive team, senior management, and Board on various matters, including the implementation of sound corporate governance practices.
Research and advise the company on state and federal regulatory matters.
Support and develop company’s privacy program to enable consistent, effective data privacy practices and minimize privacy risk.
Educate franchisees through targeted counseling, training and awareness programs.
Provide legal counsel and support for incident management and incident response.
Lead other key projects as needed to support the legal department.

education_certification.credential: Juris degree from an ABA-accredited law school with at least 7 years of legal experience at a law firm or in-house legal department in the healthcare industry, and a minimum of 7 years in a supervisory/leadership role.
Knowledge of major privacy laws such as CCPA/CPRA, GDPR, HIPAA.
Experience with national franchise systems and/or multi-unit healthcare companies.
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred).
